name: photo_finder_agent
description: This agent helps find images and photos from Unsplash

skills.name: Find a photo by ID
skills.description: Given a photo id, it can find a photo or image from Unspash

skills.name: Find a random photo
skills.description: Finds a random photo from Unsplash, if the user doesnt give any criteria

skills.name: Search for photos
skills.description: Searches photos or images from Unsplash based on user input
